About Me

Hi! I'm Scott, a software developer in Chicago working for Groupon and constantly on the lookout for interesting problems to solve with software. Christian, husband, board/computer gamer, and generally okay human. I always enjoy meeting new people so feel free to get in touch.

You can also find me on...

  • Github
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Steam
  • BoardGameGeek

Search This Site

Comments?

You may notice this blog doesn't offer comments. That's by design as a communication experiment. However, I absolutely encourage you to respond via sending me a link to a blog post. I'm always happy to link to quality, constructive responses, even/especially when we disagree.
